title: Augusta County: Letitia R. Smiley to Sister (Mary?), January 30, 1867
summary: Smiley delivers news about school and about her friends and acquaintances there. She discusses academics, weddings, social interactions, health, and general news. At one point she mentions hearing noise from outside and assuming it was "darkies shouting."
keywords: African Americans, Arts/Leisure, Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, Family, Medicine/Hospitals, Women, American Civil War
